oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Resignation form for 1st Lt. W. H. Sloan, Co. A, 3rd Tenn. Cav Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Signed in Nashville, Tenn. on June 21, 1865, this military form documents that Lt. Sloan has resigned and been paid in full, "by order of Major General Thomas." Also, a Hiwassee District land grant of 640 acres for Archibald Sloan signed by Tennessee Gov. Neill Brown. Interesting that the land grant document actually is printed with the name of Governor William Carroll and dated 1830.
